variations.description: Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 48% of ATK. Also increases Crit Chance by 5% for 5s. Can stack up to 25%.
Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 56% of ATK. Also increases Crit Chance by 5% for 5s. Can stack up to 25%.
Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 64% of ATK. Also increases Crit Chance by 5% for 5s. Can stack up to 25%.
Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 72% of ATK. Also increases Crit Chance by 5% for 5s. Can stack up to 25%.
Attacks the enemy in the back row twice, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of ATK. Also increases Crit Chance by 5% for 5s. Can stack up to 25%.
Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 60% of Elis' ATK.
Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 70% of Elis' ATK.
Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of Elis' ATK.
Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 90% of Elis' ATK.
Attacks the enemy in the back row 6 times, each dealing Physical DMG equal to 100% of Elis' ATK.
Increases damage dealt by 5% every 30 seconds, up to 25%.
Increases damage dealt by 10% every 30 seconds, up to 50%.
